channel.title: How come people can shoot thru wall's in my server? (Dodian)
channel.description:
I got an NPC and hes pretty far but visible and people can shoot him thru the wall... How can I fix this?
Thanks

item.title: How come people can shoot thru wall's in my server? (Dodian)
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

I seem to remember seeing a thing some one had that let you set objects solid, because if it isn’t set solid npcs can walk through it and all that good stuff, i think it might be in testscape but im not to sure…

Read full topic
item.source: How come people can shoot thru wall's in my server? (Dodian)
